version_description: small bug fixed

• Itunes permission issue fixed for iOS 10.2
• Bug fixes for audio trim
• Bug fixes for some crash issues

*** Huge Update ***

New Features List:
1. Add unlimited music,audio & sound tracks To your video
2. Edit Audio: Trim, Fade-in, Fade-out & Loop options
3. Edit Video: Trim & Cut frame by frame
4. Record your own voice & sounds
5. Volume control for audios
6. Video Mute/UnMute
7. Huge collection of awesome tracks
8. Sharing options
9. Brand new UI with stunning design
10. Easy to use
11. iOS 10 supported
12. Minimum processing time
13. Video Preview
14. Bug Fixes
15. Developed as best 'Add music to video app' at App Store

You asked it, you got it:
=================
We always give the highest priority of our customer feedbacks. If you have any feedback or want any
new features or found a bug, please mail us at: braincraftltd.info@gmail.com

PLEASE SUPPORT US BY RATING THIS APP & WRITE A REVIEW ON APP STORE !
- Bug Fixes
Brand new Design. Lots of new Sound Tracks and Sound Effects. Simplified User Experience. Hollywood-grade transitions. Probably the BEST Video Editor on the App Store!

Nothing changed. We sent a new updates a couple of days ago, and a little bug snuck into our software. We found it. We will not tell you what happened to it.. But it's no longer there... Keep enjoying our awesome Video Editor!
Fixed an issue where large video files could load for a long time before being available for editing.

It’s summer time! And what better way to celebrate this season, than with an amazing video of your vacations? In this version we’ve squashed some bugs, so that you will enjoy a much smoother experience.

Fellow video editors! My brothers! I see in your eyes the same hype that I see in mine! A day may come when the new feature is revealed, when we expand our editing capabilities. But it is not this day! This day we have some bugs fixed! By all that you hold dear on this good Earth, and that you want to capture in amazing videos, I bid you wait a little bit longer! Editors of the World!

A wise woman once said "You get better photo support, you get better photo support, everyone gets better photo support". Ok… I don't remember the actual quote. But you get the idea, don't you?
Long story short: you can now change the photo duration and, oh my gosh, you can also animate it! That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.
Minor bug fixes
In this new update you will not notice anything different from the last version. But our engineers are saying they did a ton of work on the back end, making this the best version of Video Music yet!
Small update to fix a few minor issues
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
We have fixed some problems and improved the performance!

Try the brand new Whip transition that will let you create more dynamic and frenetic videos.
This new version also introduces several bug fixes and a major boost of the app's performances.

Well, hello. Summer is over, it sucks, right?

We've introduced several bug fixes and tried to make our app a tiny bit faster. That sounds boring, I know.

What does it mean for you actually? It means that now you can create your lovely "OMG Take me back" summer flashback videos while sipping your pumpkin spice latte a bit quicker. Awesome, right?

In the past weeks we've been working relentlessly on a feature we know you're going to love. And today we are excited to announce you that with this update we have finally... solved some minor bugs. It was anti-climatic, wasn't it? Sorry - that feature is not ready yet. But do not sorrow! It will come with the next update. Stay tuned!

Fellow video editors! My brothers! I see in your eyes the same hype that I see in mine! A day may come when the new feature is revealed, when we expand our editing capabilities. But it is not this day! This day we have some bugs fixed! By all that you hold dear on this good Earth, and that you want to capture in amazing videos, I bid you wait a little bit longer! Editors of the World!

A wise woman once said "You get better photo support, you get better photo support, everyone gets better photo support". Ok… I don't remember the actual quote. But you get the idea, don't you?
Long story short: you can now change the photo duration and, oh my gosh, you can also animate it! That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.

Ciao video makers!
We're excited to share with you the news of the new bug we've fixed. Carry on with your video masterpieces, and don't forget to capture the beautiful spring flowers.

Hi creators,
A very happy new year to all of you! We hope you're able to create some exciting new memories this year, and put them together with VideoMusic. In this version, we've fixed some pesky bugs, and we're hoping your video editing experience will be a lot smoother because of this!
Hi creators! Guess what? We’ve fixed a very naaasty, annoying bug for you today, isn’t it great?! Indeed it is, totally worth making a video or two. Cheers!

Ciao Users!
All good on your side? We are doing great as well, thanks!
Anything new, you’d ask? Well, not much to be honest, just a few bug fixes that (hopefully) will result in performance improvement.
So far so good.
Take care, talk to you soon!
